name_original: Shattered (itch) (ETN, Kuroyasha, GrafIst, Tintoy1, YaBoiCielbird, thunder725)
description:
PS: Fullscreen mode is hugely recommanded.

Quick Young ghost! Gather the fragments of your soul before becoming in your turn a cursed spirit like all the previous souls lost in this castle !

  

  During your journey, you will play the cute little blue ghost. Your goal will be to recover all the fragments of your souls in the room during the time limit.

  But beware, everything will not be so simple, cursed spirits will chase you, it will be up to you to be the most intelligent and to dodge them. 

  

How to Play :

 

  When you enter the level, the objective is to collect all the Soul fragment. To move, just click on the shard to join it and shoot up to it. You have    exactly 10 second to complete the level before dying. 
   As you go along, new game mechanics will emerge such as cursed ghosts that will chase and kill you on contact, one-way walls, etc.

 "R" to restart 

 "Escape" to pause

This game is a submission for the GMTK Jam2021: Joined together.
